title: Elysium
starts: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley
description: Set in the year 2154, where the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth, a man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

title: Source Code
starts: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga
description: An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

title: Extracted
starts: Sasha Roiz, Jenny Mollen, Dominic Bogart
description: A scientist who has invented a technique to watch people's memories finds himself in a dangerous situation after he's tasked with entering a heroin addict's mind to see whether the man committed murder.

title: Moon
starts: Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott
description: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.
